markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Precious Material Shields](/Rules.aspx?ID=741)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 586 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Shields made of precious materials are more expensive and have different durabilities. You can make bucklers and most shields out of any of these precious materials, but only darkwood can be used to make tower shields.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Precious Material Shields
search_markdown:
<additional-info>

Chapter 11: Crafting & Treasure / Shields
</additional-info>
text: Precious Material Shields Source Core Rulebook pg. 586 4.0 Shields made of precious materials are more expensive and have different durabilities. You can make bucklers and most shields out of any of these precious materials, but only darkwood can be used to make tower shields.
